languages.text: {n}Бросив на вас долгий взгляд, Соломон с чувством отвечает:{/n} "Я благодарен за это. Спи, а я просто побуду рядом".
{n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив на вас долгий взгляд, Соломон с чувством отвечает:{/n} "Я благодарен за это. Спи, а я просто побуду рядом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."
{n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."
{n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."
{n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."
{n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous lance un long regard, puis répond sincèrement :{/n} « Je vous en suis reconnaissant. Vous pouvez vous rendormir. Je vais veiller encore un peu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous lance un long regard, puis répond sincèrement :{/n} « Je vous en suis reconnaissant. Vous pouvez vous rendormir. Je vais veiller encore un peu. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは名残惜しそうにあなたを見つめ、感情のこもった声で言った。{/n}「ありがとうございます。もう休んでください。私は少しだけここに座っていますから」
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは名残惜しそうにあなたを見つめ、感情のこもった声で言った。{/n}「ありがとうございます。もう休んでください。私は少しだけここに座っていますから」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne te mira durante un rato y responde, emocionado:{/n} «Se lo agradezco. Vuelva a dormir, estaré sentado un rato aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne te mira durante un rato y responde, emocionado:{/n} «Se lo agradezco. Vuelva a dormir, estaré sentado un rato aquí».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙久久地凝视着你，饱含深情地开了口。{/n}“我很感激。快睡吧，我在这里坐一会儿就好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙久久地凝视着你，饱含深情地开了口。{/n}“我很感激。快睡吧，我在这里坐一会儿就好。”

languages.text: {n}Sana ağır ağır baktıktan sonra hisli bir edayla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Sen uyu. Ben biraz daha oturacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana ağır ağır baktıktan sonra hisli bir edayla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Sen uyu. Ben biraz daha oturacağım."

languages.text: {n}"Solomorne sieht dich lange an und antwortet mit viel Gefühl:{/n} "Dafür danke ich Euch. Schlaft weiter. Ich bleibe hier noch etwas sitzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a lingering look, Solomorne replies with feeling,{/n} "I'm grateful for that. Go back to sleep. I'll just sit here for a while."

traits.locale_text: {n}"Solomorne sieht dich lange an und antwortet mit viel Gefühl:{/n} "Dafür danke ich Euch. Schlaft weiter. Ich bleibe hier noch etwas sitzen."
